creator: LeafNet Co.,Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
A free, all-you-can-use stamp app!
Kokoro Stamp" is a free app that allows you to use all the character images you want in various messaging applications such as email, LINE, and Twitter. All you can take! This is a useful app!

The app is updated daily, so you'll never get bored!
New stamps are added every day!
You can use all the stamps you want.

*New stamps are added every day! *.... .... You can use all the stamps you want!

This is the first time I've seen this app.

Stamps are easy to send!
It's easy to send a stamp once you've found the one you like.
You can send a stamp to a friend or family member with just one tap.
With just one tap, you can send a stamp via email, or use it as a stamp on Facebook, Twitter, or Line!

You can send stamps via email, or use them as stamps on Facebook, Twitter, or Line.
You can use your favorite character stamps and deco-mails as many times as you want.
You can use your favorite character stamps and deco-mails as many times as you want. With KokoroStamp, you can easily manage your favorite stamps and deco-mails with the favorites and history functions.

You can even save them to your phone!
If you find a stamp or deco you like but don't want to launch the app every time you want to use it, you can download it directly to your phone.
You can also download stamps and deco-mails directly to your phone. Save them and use them as much as you like!

There are many stamps divided into events and categories!
There is also a category search function for good morning and thank you, and special features for seasonal events such as birthdays, New Year's, and graduation scenes.

The top stamps on ▼Line are also free!
The free stamps on KokoroStamps are created by the same illustrators and designers who write the top stamps on the Line Creators Market.
There are many free stamps from famous illustrators and designers who have written some of the top stamps on the Line Creators Market, but with KokoroStamps, you can use stamps from famous illustrators for free, with no extra charge!
Isn't that a pretty good deal?

*･ﾟﾟ･*:.｡..｡.:*ﾟ:*

Price
App: Free
Recommended devices
Android 4.4 or higher (some devices are not recommended)
Trademark
Deco-mail and Deco-mail are registered trademarks of NTT DOCOMO.
descriptionShort: Updated daily! No registration required! All the stickers you can use, free!
